title: Spooky House : Pumpkins - Wear
summary: Explode and Smash pumpkins in this Halloween inspired game by Spooky House
developerAddress:

description: Now on Android WearExplode and Smash pumpkins in this Halloween inspired game by Spooky House Studios. Spooky Pumpkin Crush is pure and addicting fun!Features:- Chain reaction pumpkin Explosions!- Funny and slick animations- Spooky sounds- Night mode- 9 game modes: Classic, Shooter, Swapper, Chill Out, Pumpkin Invasion, Turn By Turn, etc..- Bonuses for exploding pumpkin groups of nice shapes: squares, lines, corners, etc…- Undo up to 10 moves back- 5 animation speed settings : Slow Motion, Normal, Fast, Turbo, and Animations Off- Saves game on exit or a phone call
descriptionHTML:
Now on Android Wear

Explode and Smash pumpkins in this Halloween inspired game by Spooky House Studios. Spooky Pumpkin Crush is pure and addicting fun!

Features:
- Chain reaction pumpkin Explosions!
- Funny and slick animations
- Spooky sounds
- Night mode
- 9 game modes: Classic, Shooter, Swapper, Chill Out, Pumpkin Invasion, Turn By Turn, etc..
- Bonuses for exploding pumpkin groups of nice shapes: squares, lines, corners, etc…
- Undo up to 10 moves back
- 5 animation speed settings : Slow Motion, Normal, Fast, Turbo, and Animations Off
- Saves game on exit or a phone call
comments: Best wear Game! This is an awesome game with so many different ways to smash spooky pumpkins like over 10 modes. Easy to play on tiny screen. Exciting game, my heart races trying to smash the spooky pumpkins lol! Fun to beat old score perfect for when you are sitting waiting or riding some where and need to kill some time.  I have always erased any other game I tried for wear and stopped looking after spooky pumpkin. Plus it is fun to say spooky pumpkin!

Very fun and cute game. It's a nice way to pass the time when I don't have my phone with me. I like how it includes different variations of the game if you get bored of one. The animations are subtle and very adorable.
Basically the best game for smart watches This is the only game worth downloading in my opinion.
Really nice and fun Great game, really entertaining
recentChanges: - Added Gesture Hold Long to Exit
